resources.string: SchoolToolsLib
Mark-List
Note
School-Timer
ToDo
Exam
The maximum number of points should be greater than 0!
The maximum number of points should be less than 40000!
The smallest note should be greater than 0!
The lowest grade should be smaller than the maximum number of points!
The highest grade should be greater than 0!
The highest grade should be smaller than the maximum score!
The grade multiplier should be between 0 and 5!
The point multiplier should be between 0 and 5!
The number of points with which you get the best grade should be between 0 and the Maximum points are!
The number of points with which you get the worst grade should be between 0 and the maximum number of points!
The number of points with which you get the best grade should be greater than that Score with which you get the worst grade!
The custom score should be between 0 and the maximum score lie!
The custom score should be somewhere between the score with which you can enter the get the best grade, and the number of points with which you get the worst grade are!
The custom grade should be between the largest and the smallest lie!
The format is unknown!
The file does not exist!
Wrong method was used!
